title: skillsync-task-2-6: Create common parsing utilities
description: Shared validation and normalization logic in internal/parser/common.go, error handling patterns for parsing failures, file system abstraction for testability

title: skillsync-task-3-9: Add configuration management
description: User configuration file support (YAML/JSON), default sync strategies and preferences, platform-specific configuration options

title: skillsync-task-2-8: Implement discovery command
description: CLI command to list discovered skills across platforms, output formatting options (JSON, YAML, table), filtering by platform or skill type

title: skillsync-epic-2: Implement skill parsing for Claude Code, Cursor, and Codex platforms
skillsync-task-2-3: Implement Claude Code parser
description: Parse skills from Claude Code configuration (.claude/skills/, CLAUDE.md), handle YAML/JSON formats used by Claude Code, create internal/parser/claude.go

title: skillsync-task-2-4: Implement Cursor parser
description: Parse skills from Cursor configuration (.cursor/rules/), handle markdown format with specific annotations, create internal/parser/cursor.go

title: skillsync-task-1-1: Initialize Go module
description: Create go.mod with github.com/klauern/skillsync, set Go version to 1.21+ (or latest stable), add initial dependencies: urfave/cli v3

title: skillsync-epic-1: Initialize Go project structure and basic CLI framework
skillsync-task-3-3: Create sync strategies
description: Implement merge, overwrite, and smart sync options, strategy configuration via CLI flags or config file, customizable sync rules in internal/sync/strategy.go

title: skillsync-task-1-4: Set up development tooling
description: Configure golangci-lint (.golangci.yml), create Makefile with common development tasks (build, test, lint, format), set up git hooks (optional), configure .gitignore for Go projects

title: skillsync-task-2-5: Implement Codex parser
description: Parse skills from Codex/OpenAI configuration, handle JSON schema with function definitions, create internal/parser/codex.go

title: skillsync-task-3-10: Create integration tests
description: Test end-to-end synchronization scenarios, mock platforms for testing, golden tests for output verification

title: skillsync-task-3-1: Implement synchronization engine
description: Core logic for syncing skills between platforms in internal/sync/synchronizer.go, support for bidirectional synchronization, progress reporting and logging

title: skillsync-task-1-2: Set up CLI framework
description: Install urfave/cli v3 dependency, create basic command structure in cmd/skillsync/main.go, implement help, version, and config commands

title: skillsync-task-3-7: Create export functionality
description: Export skills to different formats (JSON, YAML, markdown), platform-specific export formatting, batch export of multiple skills

title: skillsync-task-2-1: Research platform skill formats
description: Document skill formats for Claude Code (https://code.claude.com/docs/en/skills), Cursor (https://cursor.com/docs/context/skills), Codex (https://developers.openai.com/codex/skills), reference skill specification (https://agentskills.io/home)

title: skillsync-task-3-4: Parse Claude Code plugins
description: Extract skills from plugin repositories (e.g., https://github.com/klauern/skills), handle Git operations for plugin discovery (clone, pull), parse plugin manifests and skill definitions

title: skillsync-task-2-2: Create skill data model
description: Define unified Skill struct in internal/model/skill.go, include platform-specific metadata fields, create Platform enum/constants in internal/model/platform.go

title: skillsync-task-3-8: Implement sync command
description: CLI command to perform synchronization, dry-run mode to preview changes, summary report of sync operations

title: skillsync-task-3-2: Add conflict resolution
description: Handle conflicts when skills differ between platforms, three-way merge algorithm implementation, user prompts for conflict resolution (interactive mode)

title: skillsync-task-3-6: Add validation logic
description: Validate skill syntax and compatibility, check against skill specification (agentskills.io), pre-sync validation to prevent errors

title: skillsync-task-1-5: Create initial tests
description: Set up table-driven test patterns for core utilities, create test helpers in internal/util/testhelpers.go, establish testing conventions (no testify)

title: skillsync-epic-3: Implement skill synchronization and Claude Code plugin integration
skillsync-task-3-5: Implement plugin discovery
description: Find installed Claude Code plugins, scan plugin directories for skill definitions, cache plugin skills for performance

title: skillsync-task-2-7: Add platform detection
description: Auto-detect which platforms are installed/configured, scan file system for platform configuration files, check environment variables and default paths

title: skillsync-task-1-3: Create project layout
description: Establish internal package structure with clear separation of concerns, create directory structure: internal/cli/, internal/parser/, internal/model/, internal/sync/, internal/util/
